enb_long_title: Fifth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: EMISSIONS RESULTING FROM FUEL USED IN INTERNATIONAL TRANSPORTATION
sentences: Delegates adopted the draft conclusions and draft decision (FCCC/SBSTA/1999/ CRP.11) after deleting two alternative paragraphs, the first calling for ICAO and IMO to continue efforts to limit GHGs taking into account FCCC Articles 2 (objectives) and 3 (principles) and, in particular, common and differentiated responsibilities; and the second taking into account the goals of the Protocol and the FCCC.
